templates.title: Life is a dream
value: . Your eyes open, and you wonder where you are. The
smiles at you from the ceiling and
around. You see four walls that melt and breath, and the room is spinning. In the middle of the movement you see wet
back and fourth, changing into all the colors of a
sing to you in many voices, saying, "
go back to sleep." So, you close your eyes, realizing that it was all just a dream.
